content: वृद्धिः [वृध्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Growth, increase, augmentation, development; पुपोष वृद्धिं हरिदश्वदीधितेरनुप्रवेशादिव बालचंद्रमाः <ls>R. 3. 22</ls>; तपोवृद्धि; ज्ञानवृद्धि &c. {@--2@} Waxing, increase of the digits of the moon; पर्यावपीतस्य सुरैर्हिमांशोः कलाक्षयः श्लाध्यतरो हि वृद्धेः <ls>R. 5. 16</ls>, <ls>Ku. 7. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Increase in wealth, prosperity, affluence; <ls>Pt. 2. 112.</ls> {@--4@} Success, advancement, rise, progress; परवृद्धिमत्सरि मनो हि मानिनां <ls>Śi. 15. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Wealth, property. {@--6@} A heap, quantity, multitude. {@--7@} Interest; as in सरलवृद्धि, चक्रवृद्धि &c. {@--8@} Usury. {@--9@} Profit, gain. {@--10@} Enlargement of the scrotum. {@--11@} Extension of power or revenue. {@--12@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) The increas or lengthening of vowels, the change of अ, इउ, ऋ, short or long, and ऌ to आ, ऐ, औ, आर्, and आल् respectively. {@--13@} The impurity caused by child-birth in a family (called जननाशौच <ab>q. v.</ab>). {@--14@} Cutting off. {@--15@} (In law) Forfeiture (as of property).
